item.title: Edward Joseph Snowden (愛德華·約瑟夫·史諾登)｜賭上自己的一生，只為揭露政府祕密監控人民的醜聞！
item.description: 「你不關心隱私權，因為你沒有什麼可隱瞞，這和說你不關心言論自由沒什麼不同，因為你無話可說。」

item.title: The Great Scientist — Albert Einstein(1879~1955)
item.description: One day my friend asked me：「In your opinion, what is success?」「Money? Achievement? Reputation?」, These word first came into my mind. I think about it for a long time and my answer is... Contribution.
